Package org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

Class AbstractPointedAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.AbstractNode
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.AbstractAnnotation
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.AbstractPointedAnnotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBackgroundColor, HasBorderOptions, HasEventsHandler, HasExtendedShadowOptions, HasShadowOptions, IsDefaultsAbstractPointedAnnotation, IsDefaultsAnnotation, IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler, IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsEventsHandler, IsDefaultsExtendedShadowOptionsHandler, IsDefaultsShadowOptionsHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCircleBasedAnnotation, LabelAnnotation
    abstract class AbstractPointedAnnotation
extends AbstractAnnotation
implements IsDefaultsAbstractPointedAnnotation, HasBackgroundColor, HasExtendedShadowOptions
    This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin annotation DEFAULTS options for annotation which are configured by a point in a chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Returns the adjustment along x-axis (left-right) of annotation relative to above number (can be negative).
